page.title: 17THE TOWN HALL
page.content: The Town Hall or Princes Theatre is in Station Road. It was built in 1893 and can hold up to 11,200 people at anyone time sitting down. It cost 12,000 pounds to build. It is not just used for shows because there are often sales there, and every Tuesday there is a Badminton Club which you can join. In the entrance hall there is an Information Bureau with information about Clacton to give away. You can also get tickets for the next show there. If you go inside the front door, and up some stairs you can get to the balcony. Out of the 11,200 seats there are about 400 seats up there. The show going on at the moment is a dancing show called Stop Press Extra by the Tiffany Stage Academy.
